comment: Smart Data Models - ExcDC3A1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcDC3A1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. This is modified old IEEE type 3 excitation system.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: exclim
contents.comment: (exclim). true = lower limit of zero is applied to integrator output false = lower limit of zero not applied to integrator output. Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 300. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (Ke).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (Kf).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (Ki).  Typical Value = 4.83. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (Kp).  Typical Value = 4.37. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.01. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (Te).  Typical Value = 1.83. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 0.675. Default: 0

contents.name: vb1max
contents.comment: Available exciter voltage limiter (Vb1max).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vblim
contents.comment: Vb limiter indicator. true = exciter Vbmax limiter is active false = Vb1max is active.  Typical Value = true. Default: False

contents.name: vbmax
contents.comment: Available exciter voltage limiter (Vbmax).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vrmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
